flawed_nl_solution:
8 years ago James had 20-8=<<20-8=13>>13 years
So 8 years ago John had 13*2=26 years experience
That means John has 26+8=<<26+8=34>>34 years experience
So Mike has 34-16=<<34-16=18>>18 years of experience
So together they have 20+34+18=<<20+34+18=72>>72 years experience
#### 72

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
